item.title: Bussiness Logic
item.description: Business Logic References AllAboutBugBounty/Business Logic Errors.md at master · daffainfo/AllAboutBugBounty Application Logic Bypasses Bug-bounty/bugbounty_checklist.md at master · sehno/Bug-bounty Business Logic Flaws GitHub - ngalongc/bug-bounty-reference: Inspired by https://github.com/djadmin/awesome-bug-bounty, a list of bug bounty write-up that is categorized by the bug nature Business Logic Flaws - Pastebin.com In this section, we’ll introduce the concept of business logic vulnerabilities and explain how they can arise due to flawed assumptions about user behavior. What are business logic vulnerabilities?
